ProductInfo.Features:
The Noria Slim has an Ultra Slim 8mm Profile for easy handling, use and storage
The Noria Slim has an 8" LCD Touchscreen with Dual Cameras, is WiFi & 3G ready with an HDMI Port and built in Mic
Dual Core processor allows for smoother and quicker operation. Geo Sync function allows for both Vertical and Horizontal use
Dual Cameras: Rear Camera - 2.0 Mega Pixels. Front Camera - 0.3 Mega Pixels
This is a Chromo Inc® branded product. Chromo Inc® is a Registered U.S. Trademark
ProductInfo.Name: NORIA Slim 8GB Android 4.1 Jellybean Tablet - 8" LCD Touch Screen. 1.2gHz Dual Core Processor. 1GB Ram. Dual Camera. WiFi & 3G Ready. HDMI Port - In Black
